Reviews.Title: Great for alarm systems
Reviews.Author: Seabeeken
Reviews.Content: These come with double stick tape attached so mounting was very easy.  Contacts are Normal Closed so they work great with my existing alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Better than the OEM alarms contacts
Reviews.Author: P. Shansky
Reviews.Content: I have a house alarm installed many years ago. I bought these switches to replace the older larger ones that were previously installed. I used these on the new replacement windows that were recently installed. They peform well, are less conspicuous, and easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly
Reviews.Author: LAS "LAS"
Reviews.Content: It worked perfectly.  We replaced our windows and wanted to keep the same alarm system.  Would buy this again if we replace more windows.

Reviews.Title: Works great! Honeywell product....
Reviews.Author: solerider
Reviews.Content: Not much to say...Hooked it up, works great! Replaced an old Radio Shack contact with it. It is much smaller than the old one.
